description: This file defines a FastAPI application with an agent named 'StudyBuddy' that provides personalized educational assistance. It sets up the agent with various tools, models, and instructions, and exposes it via a FastAPI app.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific configurations such as memory, tools, and behavior.

classes.name: FastAPIApp
classes.description: Encapsulates a FastAPI application with associated agents and metadata.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the FastAPI server with specified app and port.
